definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Then, he borrowed the idea of a seven-day week and leap year from the Hebrew calendar.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他借用了希伯來曆法中一週七天和閏年的概念。

sentences.english: Now we have Ashton Kutcher speaking out, citing the Mayan Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 如今我們有艾什頓庫奇站進去發言，援用瑪雅曆法。

sentences.english: His book, "Ancient and Modern Book of General calendar" is the History of China's first calendar.
sentences.chinese: 他寫的《古今曆法通考》，是我國第一部歷學史。

sentences.english: In revising the calendar, Zhang attached huge importance to practice.
sentences.chinese: 在曆法修訂過程中，張遂非常重視實踐。

sentences.english: The Vedic calendar is based on cosmic cycles, or Yugas.
sentences.chinese: 吠陀曆法是建立在宇宙週期，或者說是年代之上。

sentences.english: The Suipian offered new evidence for study calendar of Chu state.
sentences.chinese: 《日書》“歲篇”爲楚國曆法研究提供了新證據。

sentences.english: Pope Gregory XIII mandated a reform to the calendar; his Gregorian calendar approximated the mean tropical year as 365.2425 days.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬教皇格里高利十三世授權改革曆法。

sentences.english: Not only our country so, east neighbour South Korea also implement these two kinds of calendars.
sentences.chinese: 不只本人國如此，東鄰韓國也同時實行這兩種曆法。

sentences.english: Legends say that the Emperor Huangdi invented the calendar in 2637 BC.
sentences.chinese: 傳說黃帝在公元前2637年發明了這套曆法。

sentences.english: The Tmperial Board of Astronomy was a research institution on astronomy and calendar in the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 清代欽天監是專門研究天文曆法的重要機構。

sentences.english: The calendar is based on the size and rotation of the planet Coruscant .
sentences.chinese: 該曆法的根據是科洛桑行星的大小和運轉速度。

sentences.english: This calendar represents 13 forces and 20 energies.
sentences.chinese: 這種曆法代表13種力量和20種能量。

sentences.english: I just know this festival is from Chinese lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道這是一個源於農事曆法的節日。

sentences.english: Although reform of the calendar, but people still use the old name to refer to September.
sentences.chinese: 雖然曆法改革了，但人們仍然沿用舊名來稱呼九月。

sentences.english: Most of the Maya calendar intervals accumulate as multiples of 20.
sentences.chinese: 瑪雅曆法的大多數時間間隔以20爲倍數。

sentences.english: But according Chinese Traditional Calendar, Every 19-year have seven-leap month.
sentences.chinese: 但依照中國傳統曆法，每十九年有七個閏年。

definition: variant of 曆法|历法 calendar
oracle inscriptions of the Shang Dynasty (16th-11th century BC) on tortoiseshells or animal bones
study of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
